1949.HK.summary: Platt Nera International Limited provides IT integrated solutions and support services to financial institutions, government departments, and agencies primarily in administrative, telecommunications, and utilities sectors in Thailand. Its IT integrated solutions comprise a range of services, including design and planning, assessment of hardware and/or software options, sourcing and sale of hardware and/or software, system installation, and launch to trial operation and maintenance, such as system upgrades for existing systems. The company also provides operational, support, upgrade, and maintenance services to IT system. Platt Nera International Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Platt Nera International Limited is a subsidiary of Pynk Holding Limited.

9105.TW.summary: Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture of electronic products in Thailand and internationally. It manufactures electronic products, such as computer and computer peripheral, telecommunication equipment, and automation equipment. Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIT-R.BK.long_name: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited
AIT-R.BK.summary: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited designs, sells, installs, services, repairs, maintains, and trains information and communication technology network systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales and Service, and Rental of Equipment. It provides solutions, including carrier grade router/switch, Web/video caching, DDOS protection, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program to work as defined, network function virtualization, and other. The company also offers data center and cloud solutions, such as consolidation and virtualization, unified data center, converged and hyper converged infrastructure, private and public cloud infrastructure, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program, and other. In addition, it provides collaboration solutions comprising communication through IP/VoIP system or unified communication, video and Web conferencing, contact center, and others; and various enterprise network solutions consisting of router, switch, wireless LAN, WAN optimization, security, application delivery control, DNS server, identity system, network management, and other. Further, the company offers the services in the development of information technology systems to various projects with the combination of concepts in applying technology with the framework in developing the system accordingly. Additionally, it provides managed services managing complicated IT system; and maintenance service on checking the operational condition of the system, which enables the system to operate continually and reduce the downtime period, and preventing problem to occur simultaneously, as well as spare parts for saving the time in solving the problem and mitigating the risks from the damage of equipment. The company also rents computers and electronic equipment. Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIT.BK.long_name: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited
AIT.BK.summary: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited designs, sells, installs, services, repairs, maintains, and trains information and communication technology network systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales and Service, and Rental of Equipment. It provides solutions, including carrier grade router/switch, Web/video caching, DDOS protection, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program to work as defined, network function virtualization, and other. The company also offers data center and cloud solutions, such as consolidation and virtualization, unified data center, converged and hyper converged infrastructure, private and public cloud infrastructure, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program, and other. In addition, it provides collaboration solutions comprising communication through IP/VoIP system or unified communication, video and Web conferencing, contact center, and others; and various enterprise network solutions consisting of router, switch, wireless LAN, WAN optimization, security, application delivery control, DNS server, identity system, network management, and other. The company also rents computers and electronic equipment. Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJA-R.BK.long_name: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited
AJA-R.BK.summary: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of electric appliances under the AJ brand in Thailand. It retails and wholesales audio and visual products, home appliances, mobile phones, and accessories. The company also provides top-up services for prepaid phone and service prepaid kiosks. In addition, it is also involved in the distribution of sport shoes; retail of top-up machines; logistic and export business, including TV drama programs and other entertainment media businesses; and provision of e-money services and accept payment through electronic methods. The company was formerly known as Crown Tech Advance Public Company Limited and changed its name to AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited in June 2017. AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AKR-R.BK.summary: Ekarat Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes transformers and solar farms in Thailand. It also distributes solar cells and solar panel; and engages in the solar electric power business. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AKR.BK.summary: Ekarat Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes transformers and solar farms in Thailand. It also distributes solar cells and solar panel; and engages in the solar electric power business. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALT-R.BK.summary: ALT Telecom Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture, installation, maintenance, rental, and sale of telecommunication network equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Network Equipment Distribution Business, Network Equipment Installation Business, and Network Equipment Rental Business. The company distributes telecommunication products comprising fiber optic cables, telecom shelters, antennas, and other telecommunication equipment, as well as rapid deployment products. It is also involved in the construction of base stations; installation of equipment and optical fiber cables; lease and management of telecommunication basic structures; and sale, installation, and maintenance of electrical equipment and systems. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bang Kruai, Thailand. ALT Telecom Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ALT Holding Co., Ltd.

APP-R.BK.summary: Applicad Public Company Limited sells computer programs and provides maintenance services for computer programs. The company offers computer software for engineering, construction, and architecture services; computer and spare parts; and machines and equipment, as well as materials and other products. It offers education solution and other related services, as well as designs and manufactures industrial parts and prototypes. In addition, the company distributes AutoCAD drawing, 3D pipe drawing, and 3D software in industrial design. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CCET-R.BK.summary: Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture of electronic products in Thailand and internationally. It manufactures electronic products, such as computer and computer peripheral, telecommunication equipment, and automation equipment. Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CCET.BK.summary: Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture of electronic products in Thailand and internationally. It manufactures electronic products, such as computer and computer peripheral, telecommunication equipment, and automation equipment. Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CIG-R.BK.summary: C.I. Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes air conditioning and refrigeration products and parts in Thailand. The company provides D-Coat, 5MM, condenser, water, evaporator, tube-in-tube, and fin and tube heat exchangers; heavy duty air purifiers, air handling units, air cooled condensers, condensing units, unit coolers, and air purifier APs; and chillers. It also offers building envelope products, such as KingZip, a zipped roofing system; K- Dek; foilback systems, including gutters, safety systems, light solutions, and specialist fabrications; RW; BENCHMARK and Kingspan products; architectural wall panels; and cold store systems. In addition, the company provides ARII smart solutions, a software solution for energy and environmental meters, and cold room packs; designing services for external and internal roofs and walls based on architectural performance and aesthetic; and generates energy modeling. In addition, the company offers coil replacement and AHU renovation; M&E design; and cold room/store and smart solutions design and installation services. Further, it provides maintenance and inspection services for air conditioning and refrigeration products and parts; and locomotive maintenance services, as well as operates a hotel. The company also exports its products. C.I. Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

COMAN-R.BK.summary: Comanche International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for hotels and serviced apartments. It offers hospitality industry management systems with integrated modules, such as front office, point of sale, call accounting, back office with accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger, and inventory control. The company also sells computers and computer software, as well as provides maintenance services and other services relating to computer software. It operates in Thailand, Myanmar, Vietnam, Laos, Australia, Cambodia, Hong Kong, Macau, China, Japan, Indonesia, the Philippines, Maldives, Malaysia, Taiwan, India, Sri Lanka, and Singapore. Comanche International Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

COMAN.BK.summary: Comanche International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for hotels and serviced apartments. It offers hospitality industry management systems with integrated modules, such as front office, point of sale, call accounting, back office with accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger, and inventory control. The company also sells computers and computer software, as well as provides maintenance services and other services relating to computer software. It operates in Thailand, Myanmar, Vietnam, Laos, Australia, Cambodia, Hong Kong, Macau, China, Japan, Indonesia, the Philippines, Maldives, Malaysia, Taiwan, India, Sri Lanka, and Singapore. Comanche International Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CPW-R.BK.summary: Copperwired Public Company Limited retails, distributes, and repairs computers, mobile phones, and accessories in Thailand. It operates various stores under the dotlife, Apple Reseller, U-Store, iServe, and KOAN names. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Copperwired Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

CPW.BK.summary: Copperwired Public Company Limited retails, distributes, and repairs computers, mobile phones, and accessories in Thailand. It operates various stores under the dotlife, Apple Reseller, U-Store, iServe, and KOAN names. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Copperwired Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

CSS-R.BK.long_name: Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited
CSS-R.BK.summary: Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes and installs production equipment for electricity, water, air conditioning, and telecommunication systems in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Distribution Electrical Equipment and Installation Service. The Distribution Electrical Equipment segment supplies electrical cable and other electrical systems equipment, and passive fire protection materials and equipment. The Installation Service segment designs and installs telecommunication and fire protection systems. The company also distributes and installs tubes. Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

FORTH-R.BK.summary: Forth Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes telecommunication and electronic equipment, and assembly electronic parts in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Electronics Manufacturing Service Business, Enterprise Solutions Business, and Smart Service Business. The Electronics Manufacturing Service Business segment procures, designs, produces, and assembles circuit boards and electronic devices; and sources and distributes electronic components and semiconductor raw materials. The Enterprise Solutions Business segment provides telecommunications networks design services; traffic light system integration and distribution services; electricity lamps and lighting equipment procurement and distribution services; electronic electricity meters products distribution services; and enterprise resource planning services, as well as produces and distributes satellite vehicle data transmission equipment. The Smart Service Business segment offers electronic payment services, payment services for business partners, and electronic money services, as well as personal loans; and operates a beverage vending machine and automatic products and offers pre-paid mobile phone top-up and online payment services, as well as operates e-marketplace for online trading and e-commerce. The company also provides consulting services for information management and computer software management; and engineering services. Forth Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FORTH.BK.summary: Forth Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes telecommunication and electronic equipment, and assembly electronic parts in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Electronics Manufacturing Service Business, Enterprise Solutions Business, and Smart Service Business. The Electronics Manufacturing Service Business segment procures, designs, produces, and assembles circuit boards and electronic devices; and sources and distributes electronic components and semiconductor raw materials. The Enterprise Solutions Business segment provides telecommunications networks design services; traffic light system integration and distribution services; electricity lamps and lighting equipment procurement and distribution services; electronic electricity meters products distribution services; and enterprise resource planning services, as well as produces and distributes satellite vehicle data transmission equipment. The Smart Service Business segment offers electronic payment services, payment services for business partners, and electronic money services, as well as personal loans; and operates a beverage vending machine and automatic products and offers pre-paid mobile phone top-up and online payment services, as well as operates e-marketplace for online trading and e-commerce. The company also provides consulting services for information management and computer software management; and engineering services. Forth Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HANA-R.BK.summary: Hana Microelectronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in electronic components. It offers printed circuit board and integrated circuit assemblies, as well as produces liquid crystal on silicon devices that are being used for microdisplays and optical telecommunications components. The company also provides agent and customer services. It has operations in Malaysia, China, the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HANA.BK.summary: Hana Microelectronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in electronic components. It offers printed circuit board and integrated circuit assemblies, as well as produces liquid crystal on silicon devices that are being used for microdisplays and optical telecommunications components. The company also provides agent and customer services. It has operations in Malaysia, China, the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IIG-R.BK.summary: I&I Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital and technology consulting company in Thailand. The company provides consultation on computer systems and sell subscription and support on computer software licenses. It also offers services in the areas of business analytics and marketing strategy, data management and technology, customer relationship and experience management, and cross-channel and campaign management. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Ratchathewi, Thailand.

ILINK-R.BK.summary: Interlink Communication Public Company Limited imports and distributes IT network cabling system products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Distribution Business, Telecommunication Business, and Engineering Business. It also outsources design and installation service of network and cabling system for computers and telecommunications. In addition, the company operates as a telecommunication service provider, which invests in the construction of fiber-optic cable network to provide high-speed leased line service; and a contractor in submarine cable and transmission lines, including fiber optic and high voltage. Further, it provides data center services, such as co-location, cloud computing, and disaster recovery to enterprise customers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ILINK.BK.summary: Interlink Communication Public Company Limited imports and distributes IT network cabling system products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Distribution Business, Telecommunication Business, and Engineering Business. It also outsources design and installation service of network and cabling system for computers and telecommunications. In addition, the company operates as a telecommunication service provider, which invests in the construction of fiber-optic cable network to provide high-speed leased line service; and a contractor in submarine cable and transmission lines, including fiber optic and high voltage. Further, it provides data center services, such as co-location, cloud computing, and disaster recovery to enterprise customers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INET-R.BK.summary: Internet Thailand Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides Internet access, and information technology and communication integrated services for businesses and individuals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Access Business and Business Solutions. It offers full Internet access services with various speeds through leased lines and MetroLAN network connected to the offices' Intranet networks; and Internet data center services comprising business continuity planning/disaster recovery center, co-location, INET security center, and server leasing services for business organizations or agencies that need to present data through Internet/Intranet for public and private networks. The company also provides cloud services, which is a virtual computing service that includes infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, and software as a service; and EDC network pool services, which is a credit card payment system center linked between banks and other merchants through telecommunications networks, such as landline telephone, mobile phone, and Internet. In addition, it offers online applications, such as online recruitment, mail services, etc. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INET.BK.summary: Internet Thailand Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides Internet access, and information technology and communication integrated services for businesses and individuals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Access Business and Business Solutions. It offers full Internet access services with various speeds through leased lines and MetroLAN network connected to the offices' Intranet networks; and Internet data center services comprising business continuity planning/disaster recovery center, co-location, INET security center, and server leasing services for business organizations or agencies that need to present data through Internet/Intranet for public and private networks. The company also provides cloud services, which is a virtual computing service that includes infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, and software as a service; and EDC network pool services, which is a credit card payment system center linked between banks and other merchants through telecommunications networks, such as landline telephone, mobile phone, and Internet. In addition, it offers online applications, such as online recruitment, mail services, etc. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INSET-R.BK.summary: Infraset Public Company Limited constructs data centers in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Construct of Data Center and Information Technology, Infrastructure and Telecommunication Network, and Maintenance and Services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INSET.BK.summary: Infraset Public Company Limited constructs data centers in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Construct of Data Center and Information Technology, Infrastructure and Telecommunication Network, and Maintenance and Services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IRCP-R.BK.long_name: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited
IRCP-R.BK.summary: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and rendering system development services of information technology, network information, and telecommunication information systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Project Business and Non-Project Business. It provides telecommunication network to connect points to points via fiber optic and wireless technologies, such as DWDM, SDH, Multiplexer, wireless, and broadband; next generation network solutions to link public telephone network with IP network that include VOIP, VDO, instant messaging, etc.; soft switch technology solutions; mobile telephone network solutions; FTTx networking total solutions; and 3G and LTE services. The company also offers solutions for enterprise, such as enterprise resource planning, enterprise application integration, data warehouse and business intelligence, custom application development, and implementation services. In addition, it provides software replication and pad printing services; and digital broadcasting solutions, including headend equipment, television transmission systems, new media, and content production solutions, as well as designs, builds, and installs digital TV system equipment for television and broadcasting industry. Additionally, it provides project management and maintenance services for integrated radio and television broadcasting systems. International Research Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

IRCP.BK.long_name: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited
IRCP.BK.summary: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and rendering system development services of information technology, network information, and telecommunication information systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Project Business and Non-Project Business. It provides telecommunication network to connect points to points via fiber optic and wireless technologies, such as DWDM, SDH, Multiplexer, wireless, and broadband; next generation network solutions to link public telephone network with IP network that include VOIP, VDO, instant messaging, etc.; soft switch technology solutions; mobile telephone network solutions; FTTx networking total solutions; and 3G and LTE services. The company also offers solutions for enterprise, such as enterprise resource planning, enterprise application integration, data warehouse and business intelligence, custom application development, and implementation services. In addition, it provides software replication and pad printing services; and digital broadcasting solutions, including headend equipment, television transmission systems, new media, and content production solutions, as well as designs, builds, and installs digital TV system equipment for television and broadcasting industry. Additionally, it provides project management and maintenance services for integrated radio and television broadcasting systems. International Research Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

IT-R.BK.summary: IT City Public Company Limited engages in the retail of computers, tablets, peripherals, smartphones, and other related accessories and IT products under the IT CITY name. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 130 branches. IT City Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IWBB.summary: IWEB, Inc. operates as a technology development and services company that provides coding services in various industries and markets primarily in Thailand. It focuses on image, audio, Web, and security coding technologies. The company's technology enables enterprises to imbed or imprint invisible digital identities to media and objects. Its coding technology provides the means to infuse persistent digital information to computers and digital devices into various forms of media content; and permits smartphones, tablets, industrial scanners, and other computer interfaces to identify relevant data from media content. IWEB, Inc. is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KCE-R.BK.summary: KCE Electronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric printed circuit boards (PCBs) under the KCE trademark worldwide. The company's PCBs, manufactured from copper clad laminate, are used in various applications, including automotive, industrial, computer, and telecom systems. It also manufactures and distributes chemicals products, and prepreg and laminate products. The company was formerly known as Kuang Charoen Electronics Company Limited. KCE Electronics Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KCE.BK.summary: KCE Electronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric printed circuit boards (PCBs) under the KCE trademark worldwide. The company's PCBs, manufactured from copper clad laminate, are used in various applications, including automotive, industrial, computer, and telecom systems. It also manufactures and distributes chemicals products, and prepreg and laminate products. The company was formerly known as Kuang Charoen Electronics Company Limited. KCE Electronics Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KCEA.SG.summary: KCE Electronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric printed circuit boards (PCBs) under the KCE trademark worldwide. The company's PCBs, manufactured from copper clad laminate, are used in various applications, including automotive, industrial, computer, and telecom systems. It also manufactures and distributes chemicals products, and prepreg and laminate products. The company was formerly known as Kuang Charoen Electronics Company Limited. KCE Electronics Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KYE-R.BK.long_name: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited
KYE-R.BK.summary: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes household electrical appliances in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. The company offers home electrical appliances, such as refrigerators, electric fans, ventilating fans, water pumps, and jet towels under the Mitsubishi Electric name. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries. The company was formerly known as Kang Yong Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

KYE.BK.long_name: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited
KYE.BK.summary: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes household electrical appliances in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. The company offers home electrical appliances, such as refrigerators, electric fans, ventilating fans, water pumps, and jet towels under the Mitsubishi Electric name. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries. The company was formerly known as Kang Yong Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

METCO-R.BK.summary: Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells metal and plastic parts for audio/visual equipment; and electronic equipment for automobiles and office automation appliances in Thailand, Japan, the United States, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Electric Parts for Automotive Business, Electronic Parts for Office Automation Business, and Other Business. The company offers car related products, such as display audio units, audio panels, CD and DVD changers, gear units, air bag parts, keyless entry transmitters and receivers, corner sensors, press and window regulator parts, mounting boards for keyless entry receivers, print circuit board assemblies for CD changers, and mounting boards for cameras. It also manufactures video cameras and single-lens reflex camera products for consumers, including video camera LCD units, back cover and lens units for single lens reflex cameras, and top cover units for mirrorless cameras; and printer finished products and electronic parts, such as printer finished products, thermal fuses, hermetic terminals, and magnetron filter box parts for use in industrial applications. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Muramoto Industry Co., Ltd.

METCO.BK.summary: Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells metal and plastic parts for audio/visual equipment; and electronic equipment for automobiles and office automation appliances in Thailand, Japan, the United States, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Electric Parts for Automotive Business, Electronic Parts for Office Automation Business, and Other Business. The company offers car related products, such as display audio units, audio panels, CD and DVD changers, gear units, air bag parts, keyless entry transmitters and receivers, corner sensors, press and window regulator parts, mounting boards for keyless entry receivers, print circuit board assemblies for CD changers, and mounting boards for cameras. It also manufactures video cameras and single-lens reflex camera products for consumers, including video camera LCD units, back cover and lens units for single lens reflex cameras, and top cover units for mirrorless cameras; and printer finished products and electronic parts, such as printer finished products, thermal fuses, hermetic terminals, and magnetron filter box parts for use in industrial applications. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Muramoto Industry Co., Ltd.

MFEC-R.BK.summary: MFEC Public Company Limited operates as an information technology (IT) services company in Thailand. The company operates through Systems Integration, Maintenance Service, and IT Professional Service segments. It provides securities trading, mobile financial, gamifcation, managed service, information service on mobile/tablet applications, advertisement/PR/marketing, service for platform management system, and ticketing system for all play types. The company also offers mobile products, software as a service, e-commerce, digital content, payment gateway, financial technology, consulting service and computer system development, IT project management and equipment management, outsourcing IT, audit, warranty management, maintenance, and system integration for cloud and office work. In addition, it provides business analytics, agent management, agent leader, smart quotation, eApplication, iClaim, legal tracking system, iCollection, appraisal collateral, and big data services. MFEC Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MFEC.BK.summary: MFEC Public Company Limited operates as an information technology (IT) services company in Thailand. The company operates through Systems Integration, Maintenance Service, and IT Professional Service segments. It provides securities trading, mobile financial, gamifcation, managed service, information service on mobile/tablet applications, advertisement/PR/marketing, service for platform management system, and ticketing system for all play types. The company also offers mobile products, software as a service, e-commerce, digital content, payment gateway, financial technology, consulting service and computer system development, IT project management and equipment management, outsourcing IT, audit, warranty management, maintenance, and system integration for cloud and office work. In addition, it provides business analytics, agent management, agent leader, smart quotation, eApplication, iClaim, legal tracking system, iCollection, appraisal collateral, and big data services. MFEC Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MSC-R.BK.long_name: Metro Systems Corporation Public Company Limited
MSC-R.BK.summary: Metro Systems Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in trading computers and equipment, software, supplies, and office equipment, as well as provision of related services in Thailand. The company provides server, storage, and network for IT infrastructure; backup, modernized application, and IBM I solutions for infrastructure; contractual, supplies, and outsourcing printing and services solutions for digital printing; and compute, network, storage, HCI, private, hybrid, public cloud, middleware and other, database, API, and backup and DR, as well as operating systems for digital infrastructure. It also offers businesses transformation, architecture design, application development, and infrastructure and managed service for digital transformation services; workforce and unified collaboration, mobility workforce, business process automation, and IT process management for digital collaboration; and SOLIDWORKS 3D CAD, simulation, electrical design, SOLIDWORKS product data management, and technical communication for designed and engineering solutions. In addition, it offers data integration tool, data platform, BI and data visualization, advance analytics and AI/ML, and data scientist platform. Further, it offers end point, network, server and data, cloud, and mobility security; and training and services. It also offers hardware products and office supplies. Metro Systems Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NETBAY-R.BK.summary: Netbay Public Company Limited creates, designs, and develops digital business technology platform and omni channel connectivity gateway solutions for the electronic business transaction exchange in the field of trading. The company provides digital business services, which include, e-customs; customs e-payment; e-manifest, a paperless report for imports/ exports system; e-express; electronic transaction reporting gateway for financial institutes; customer due diligence gateways; and software development and cloud computing services. It also offers Software as a Service, including data center, disaster recovery center, operating software system, which supports the electronic transaction reporting gateway, networking systems, and protection of information services. In Addition, the company acts as electronic data interchange provider for electronic transaction reporting and audit report services for life insurance, non-life insurance, securities, asset management, and finance companies, as well as financial institutions and banks. Further, it offers electronics bank guarantee data interchange services between banks and Comptroller General's Department. It serves international and domestic trade, and service sectors; manufacturers, exporters, importers, freight forwarders, shipping agents, customs brokers, terminal operators, transportation service providers, and logistics and supply chain communities; ocean lines, air, express couriers; and the Thai Chamber of Commerce and Board of Trade of Thailand. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NETBAY.BK.summary: Netbay Public Company Limited creates, designs, and develops digital business technology platform and omni channel connectivity gateway solutions for the electronic business transaction exchange in the field of trading. The company provides digital business services, which include, e-customs; customs e-payment; e-manifest, a paperless report for imports/ exports system; e-express; electronic transaction reporting gateway for financial institutes; customer due diligence gateways; and software development and cloud computing services. It also offers Software as a Service, including data center, disaster recovery center, operating software system, which supports the electronic transaction reporting gateway, networking systems, and protection of information services. In Addition, the company acts as electronic data interchange provider for electronic transaction reporting and audit report services for life insurance, non-life insurance, securities, asset management, and finance companies, as well as financial institutions and banks. Further, it offers electronics bank guarantee data interchange services between banks and Comptroller General's Department. It serves international and domestic trade, and service sectors; manufacturers, exporters, importers, freight forwarders, shipping agents, customs brokers, terminal operators, transportation service providers, and logistics and supply chain communities; ocean lines, air, express couriers; and the Thai Chamber of Commerce and Board of Trade of Thailand. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NEWS-R.BK.long_name: News Network Corporation Public Company Limited
NEWS-R.BK.summary: News Network Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells software in Thailand. The company is also involved in procuring hardware products; distributing and servicing technology products; providing internet, mass communication, programs production, system integrator, and new media services, as well as news; and trading and servicing examining tools and equipment in occupational health activities. In addition, it provides information through online system and electronic media, as well as publishing production and distribution services; and distributes books, as well as distribution and installation services for environment projects. The company was formerly known as Solution Corner (1998) Public Company Limited and changed its name to News Network Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2015. News Network Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NEX-R.BK.summary: Nex Point Public Company Limited designs, manufactures, and sells electronic products in Thailand. The company offers hard disk drive components, including shaft and sleeve, motor base and hub, sleeve, flange, and counter plate products; and camera and imaging parts, such as components for producing consumer electronics and entertainment products comprising cameras, video cameras, MP3, game players, etc. It also provides high precision components for automotive industries; and mini-implants for dental implants process and surgery, as well as assemble small motors for cameras. In addition, the company offers software, and application and platform for large logistics management system; property procurement services; financial technology services; and installation and consulting services for computer systems, as well as sells hardware and software products; and rents and sells buses. Further, it is also involved in the transportation and logistics, supply assets, labor, and property rental businesses. Additionally, the company creates, develops, and customizes computer software for IT services. The company was formerly known as Single Point Parts (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Nex Point Public Company Limited in May 2019. Nex Point Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

NVAX.F.summary: Hana Microelectronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in electronic components. It offers printed circuit board and integrated circuit assemblies, as well as produces liquid crystal on silicon devices that are being used for microdisplays and optical telecommunications components. The company also provides agent and customer services. It has operations in Malaysia, China, the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVPA.F.summary: KCE Electronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric printed circuit boards (PCBs) under the KCE trademark worldwide. The company's PCBs, manufactured from copper clad laminate, are used in various applications, including automotive, industrial, computer, and telecom systems. It also manufactures and distributes chemicals products, and prepreg and laminate products. The company was formerly known as Kuang Charoen Electronics Company Limited. KCE Electronics Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PT-R.BK.summary: Premier Technology Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, Datapro Computer Systems Company Limited, distributes and provides services relating to computer and computer systems in Thailand. It develops its own products; and distributes products of other companies. The company's products include hardware and software products, including IT and multimedia products; and system and data management, and application software. It also offers annual maintenance, training and consulting, outsourcing, and other services; and engages in the rental of an office building. The company was formerly known as Premier Engineering and Technology Public Company Limited and changed its name to Premier Technology Public Company Limited in October 2006. Premier Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SICT-R.BK.long_name: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited
SICT-R.BK.summary: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited designs, markets, and sells microchips for RFID applications. The company engages in the design and development of linear and mixed-signal integrated circuits (ICs). Its products include high and low frequency transponder ICs, immobilizers, and high frequency reader ICs. Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SICT.BK.long_name: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited
SICT.BK.summary: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited designs, markets, and sells microchips for RFID applications. The company engages in the design and development of linear and mixed-signal integrated circuits (ICs). Its products include high and low frequency transponder ICs, immobilizers, and high frequency reader ICs. Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIMAT-R.BK.summary: Simat Technologies Public Company Limited distributes computer hardware, software, and network accessories in Thailand and Malaysia. The company also offers computer information technology system development services. It sells various hardware products, such as corded and cordless barcode scanners, micro kiosks, mobile printers, barcode and label printers, card printers, face recognition products, mobile computers, wireless and networking products, RFID barcode readers and printers, and RFID antennas. The company also provides various software products comprising ManageSales, a sales force automation system; ManageWare, a warehouse management system solution; MobileNET; and Sky Frog. In addition, it manufactures self-adhesive label stickers, such as ribbonless, ESD, high temperature, healthcare, and barcode and serialize labels. Further, the company offers project management, implementation and training, helpdesk support, software customization and maintenance, custom software development, and technical services. Simat Technologies Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIMAT.BK.summary: Simat Technologies Public Company Limited distributes computer hardware, software, and network accessories in Thailand and Malaysia. The company also offers computer information technology system development services. It sells various hardware products, such as corded and cordless barcode scanners, micro kiosks, mobile printers, barcode and label printers, card printers, face recognition products, mobile computers, wireless and networking products, RFID barcode readers and printers, and RFID antennas. The company also provides various software products comprising ManageSales, a sales force automation system; ManageWare, a warehouse management system solution; MobileNET; and Sky Frog. In addition, it manufactures self-adhesive label stickers, such as ribbonless, ESD, high temperature, healthcare, and barcode and serialize labels. Further, the company offers project management, implementation and training, helpdesk support, software customization and maintenance, custom software development, and technical services. Simat Technologies Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SINGER-R.BK.summary: Singer Thailand Public Company Limited distributes household electrical and commercial appliances in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Trade sales, Hire purchase and loans, and Service and Others. It offers household electrical appliances, such as sewing machines, sewing needles, general lubricating oils in drips, and scissors; refrigerators, washing machines, gas stoves, and air conditioners; and audio and video products, including Flat screen LED TVs, Smart TVs , and home theatre systems. The company also provides commercial appliances comprising freezers, beverage coolers, wine cooler cabinets, bakery freezers, and slush ice machines; mobile phone airtime, petrol, and drinking water vending machines; and agricultural equipment and tools, such as water pumps and rice milling machines. In addition, the company engages in the life and non-life insurance brokerage business; hire purchase of home appliances, commercial products, mobile phones, and vehicles, as well as loan receivables with vehicle collateral and others; and repair and maintenance service of electrical appliances. Additionally, it provides debt collection services to a related company. The company sells its products under the Singer brand name through a network of branch outlets and sales representatives, as well as through dealers in Thailand. Singer Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SINGER.BK.summary: Singer Thailand Public Company Limited distributes household electrical and commercial appliances in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Trade sales, Hire purchase and loans, and Service and Others. It offers household electrical appliances, such as sewing machines, sewing needles, general lubricating oils in drips, and scissors; refrigerators, washing machines, gas stoves, and air conditioners; and audio and video products, including Flat screen LED TVs, Smart TVs , and home theatre systems. The company also provides commercial appliances comprising freezers, beverage coolers, wine cooler cabinets, bakery freezers, and slush ice machines; mobile phone airtime, petrol, and drinking water vending machines; and agricultural equipment and tools, such as water pumps and rice milling machines. In addition, the company engages in the life and non-life insurance brokerage business; hire purchase of home appliances, commercial products, mobile phones, and vehicles, as well as loan receivables with vehicle collateral and others; and repair and maintenance service of electrical appliances. Additionally, it provides debt collection services to a related company. The company sells its products under the Singer brand name through a network of branch outlets and sales representatives, as well as through dealers in Thailand. Singer Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIS-R.BK.summary: SiS Distribution (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes computer components, smartphones, and office automation equipment in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Commercial Products, Consumer Products, Value Added Products, and Phones. It offers servers, home and business PCs, storage and networking devices, printers/scanners, and monitors; and private cloud, enterprise storage and backup, and security services. The company is also involved in the service and rental of computers and accessories. SiS Distribution (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SKY-R.BK.summary: Sky ICT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in information and communication technology (ICT), and system integration businesses in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: System Integration, Sales and Service, and Finance Lease segments. It offers consultation, design, installation, maintenance, procurement, and distribution of products and equipment related to the ICT and system integration. The company also provides CCTV, smart office, smart home, smart city, networks infrastructure, cyber security, and unified communication solutions; and network cabling services, including network cable management, single and multi-mode fiber optic cabling, LAN installation and cable management, and rack cabinet installation for network and server/CCTV security installation. In addition, it distributes IT products, such as computer, notebook, scanner, printer, toner, server, storage, switch, and software products; and non-IT solutions. Further, the company is involved in the finance lease business. Sky ICT Public Company Limited serves clients in the education, banking, security, government, and other sectors. The company was formerly known as CCN-TECH Public Company Limited and changed its name to Sky ICT Public Company Limited July 2017. Sky ICT Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMT-R.BK.summary: Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronics manufacturing services in Thailand and the United States. It operates through two segments, Microelectronics Module Assembly and Integrated Circuit Packaging. The company is involved in the manufacture and distribution of integrated circuit boards and radio frequency identification tags; equipment used to generate electricity from solar energy or alternative energy; and generation and distribution of electricity from solar energy or alternative energy, as well as trading business. It serves semiconductor, optical component, advanced consumer, automotive, niche and specialty, medical device, and solar industries. Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

SMT.BK.summary: Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronics manufacturing services in Thailand and the United States. It operates through two segments, Microelectronics Module Assembly and Integrated Circuit Packaging. The company is involved in the manufacture and distribution of integrated circuit boards and radio frequency identification tags; equipment used to generate electricity from solar energy or alternative energy; and generation and distribution of electricity from solar energy or alternative energy, as well as trading business. It serves semiconductor, optical component, advanced consumer, automotive, niche and specialty, medical device, and solar industries. Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

SNC-R.BK.summary: SNC Former Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells component parts for automobile air conditioners and cooling machines in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in the contract manufacturing and assembly of air conditioners for household use. In addition, the company manufactures plastic parts for electric appliance and automobiles; household and automotive air conditioner parts; heat pumps for water heat pumps; insulation copper price kits used for the installation of cooling machines and foam pipe insulation; and tools for equipment. Further, it engages in the generation of biomass electric plant garbage; and invests in alternative power plant. SNC Former Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

SNC.BK.summary: SNC Former Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells component parts for automobile air conditioners and cooling machines in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in the contract manufacturing and assembly of air conditioners for household use. In addition, the company manufactures plastic parts for electric appliance and automobiles; household and automotive air conditioner parts; heat pumps for water heat pumps; insulation copper price kits used for the installation of cooling machines and foam pipe insulation; and tools for equipment. Further, it engages in the generation of biomass electric plant garbage; and invests in alternative power plant. SNC Former Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

SPVI-R.BK.short_name: S P V I PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED
SPVI-R.BK.long_name: S P V I Public Company Limited
SPVI-R.BK.summary: S P V I Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of computers, mobile phones, and related accessories and services in Thailand. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 48 branches. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SVI-R.BK.summary: SVI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronic manufacturing services in Asia and Europe. The company operates in three segments: Industrial Control System, Communication Network, and Automotive & Transportation. It offers manufacturing and solution-oriented services, such as industrial electronics and microelectronics for telecommunications components, specialized electronic assemblies, and medical technologies industries. The company also provides new product introduction, joint development engineering, design for manufacturing, supply chain optimization, prototyping, failure analysis and risk management, testing, product transfer, and reverse logistics management. In addition, it provides electronic manufacturing systems that produce full box-build and system build product solutions; and raw material sourcing services. The company serves industrial control, automotive and transportation, medical, communications and networks, audio/video, clean energy, microelectronics, and photonics and lighting markets. The company was formerly known as Semiconductor Venture International Limited. SVI Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand.

SVI.BK.summary: SVI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronic manufacturing services in Asia and Europe. The company operates in three segments: Industrial Control System, Communication Network, and Automotive & Transportation. It offers manufacturing and solution-oriented services, such as industrial electronics and microelectronics for telecommunications components, specialized electronic assemblies, and medical technologies industries. The company also provides new product introduction, joint development engineering, design for manufacturing, supply chain optimization, prototyping, failure analysis and risk management, testing, product transfer, and reverse logistics management. In addition, it provides electronic manufacturing systems that produce full box-build and system build product solutions; and raw material sourcing services. The company serves industrial control, automotive and transportation, medical, communications and networks, audio/video, clean energy, microelectronics, and photonics and lighting markets. The company was formerly known as Semiconductor Venture International Limited. SVI Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand.

SVOA-R.BK.summary: SVOA Public Company Limited provides information technology (IT) products and services in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: IT Distribution, Systems Integration, IT Outsourcing Services, and IT Project. It distributes IT products, such as computer equipment, peripherals, and software; assembles and distributes computers under SVOA Computer brand name through partners and authorized dealers; and provides repair and maintenance services for IT products through 11 SVOA service centers, and approximately 108 authorized SVOA service providers. The company also offers IT consulting services, system implementation, network system equipment, security system, and end-to-end IT solutions for financial and banking institutions, telecommunication companies, manufacturing and insurance industries, savings cooperatives, hospitals, government agencies, state enterprises, and private organizations, as well as data processing center, information technology management, and maintenance services. In addition, it provides computer system infrastructure services, including ATM outsource co-location, dedicated server, Web and email hosting, and disaster recovery support. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SVOA.BK.summary: SVOA Public Company Limited provides information technology (IT) products and services in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: IT Distribution, Systems Integration, IT Outsourcing Services, and IT Project. It distributes IT products, such as computer equipment, peripherals, and software; assembles and distributes computers under SVOA Computer brand name through partners and authorized dealers; and provides repair and maintenance services for IT products through 11 SVOA service centers, and approximately 108 authorized SVOA service providers. The company also offers IT consulting services, system implementation, network system equipment, security system, and end-to-end IT solutions for financial and banking institutions, telecommunication companies, manufacturing and insurance industries, savings cooperatives, hospitals, government agencies, state enterprises, and private organizations, as well as data processing center, information technology management, and maintenance services. In addition, it provides computer system infrastructure services, including ATM outsource co-location, dedicated server, Web and email hosting, and disaster recovery support. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SYNEX-R.BK.summary: Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of computers, computer peripherals, software, IT systems, computer consumables, and communication devices in Thailand. It distributes mobile phones and tablets; personal computers; and PC components comprising motherboard/mainboard, hard disk drives, central processing unit, dynamic random access memory, video graphics array, power supply units, and computer cases. The company also offers PC monitor, mouse, keyboard, speakers, headsets, mobile phone accessories, web camera/video camera, optical disk drive, projector, uninterruptible power supply, inkjet printer, laser printer, all-in-one printer/multi-function printer, dot matrix printer, plotter printer, pocket photo printer, scanner, sewing machine, ink cartridges, toner, printer ribbons, USB flash drive, and external hard disk drives/external solid-state drive. In addition, it provides commercial notebook, digital signage, closed circuit television, barcode and labelling equipment, server, network attached storage, switch, router, LAN card, wireless LAN, network cabling system, network management software and hardware, network security or firewall, and network accessories; and cloud services. Further, the company offers smart watch, wristband and smart eyewear, virtual reality glasses and headsets, drones, underwater scooter, smart light bulbs, internet protocol camera, industrial network products, and education robots; IoT products; and general and technical services and maintenance for network devices, servers, and various applications software. It serves computer retailers and wholesalers, software solution providers, computer manufacturers, department stores, superstores, and stationary shops. The company was formerly known as Compex (Thailand) Company Limited and changed its name to Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited in 2002. Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SYNEX.BK.summary: Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of computers, computer peripherals, software, IT systems, computer consumables, and communication devices in Thailand. It distributes mobile phones and tablets; personal computers; and PC components comprising motherboard/mainboard, hard disk drives, central processing unit, dynamic random access memory, video graphics array, power supply units, and computer cases. The company also offers PC monitor, mouse, keyboard, speakers, headsets, mobile phone accessories, web camera/video camera, optical disk drive, projector, uninterruptible power supply, inkjet printer, laser printer, all-in-one printer/multi-function printer, dot matrix printer, plotter printer, pocket photo printer, scanner, sewing machine, ink cartridges, toner, printer ribbons, USB flash drive, and external hard disk drives/external solid-state drive. In addition, it provides commercial notebook, digital signage, closed circuit television, barcode and labelling equipment, server, network attached storage, switch, router, LAN card, wireless LAN, network cabling system, network management software and hardware, network security or firewall, and network accessories; and cloud services. Further, the company offers smart watch, wristband and smart eyewear, virtual reality glasses and headsets, drones, underwater scooter, smart light bulbs, internet protocol camera, industrial network products, and education robots; IoT products; and general and technical services and maintenance for network devices, servers, and various applications software. It serves computer retailers and wholesalers, software solution providers, computer manufacturers, department stores, superstores, and stationary shops. The company was formerly known as Compex (Thailand) Company Limited and changed its name to Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited in 2002. Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TEAM-R.BK.summary: Team Precision Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and assembles printed circuit and electronics circuit boards in Thailand and internationally. The company offers electronics manufacturing services, such as through-hole assembly; surface mount technology assembly; fine pitch ball grid array, flip chip, and chip-on-board assembly in clean-room environment; de-ionized water-cleaning; chemical compound encapsulation; and box build and retail packing services. It also provides design and prototyping services consisting of design for manufacturing, design for test, PCB layout design, and complete product software and hardware design. In addition, the company offers logistics and warehousing services comprising build to order, configure to order, fulfillment warehouse, hub warehousing with online monitoring, and overseas milk run services. The company serves customers in the industrial, medical, specialty, telecommunication, automotive, and consumer industries. Team Precision Public Company Limited is headquartered in Mueang Prachinburi, Thailand.

THCOM-R.BK.summary: Thaicom Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transponder services for domestic and international communications. The company operates through three segments: Satellite and Related Services, Internet and Media Services, and Telephone Business Abroad. It also offers broadband content, internet data center, Internet, satellite uplink-downlink, broadcasting television, telecommunications, telephone network, and mobile content services. In addition, the company sells user terminal iPSTAR, as well as direct television equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of technical support services in relation to satellite business, as well as engineering and development services on communication technology and electronics; and system integration consultancy services for broadband networks. The company has operations in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, Lao PDR, Australia, New Zealand, Mauritius, the British Virgin Islands, Japan, and India. Thaicom Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THCOM.BK.summary: Thaicom Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transponder services for domestic and international communications. The company operates through three segments: Satellite and Related Services, Internet and Media Services, and Telephone Business Abroad. It also offers broadband content, internet data center, Internet, satellite uplink-downlink, broadcasting television, telecommunications, telephone network, and mobile content services. In addition, the company sells user terminal iPSTAR, as well as direct television equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of technical support services in relation to satellite business, as well as engineering and development services on communication technology and electronics; and system integration consultancy services for broadband networks. The company has operations in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, Lao PDR, Australia, New Zealand, Mauritius, the British Virgin Islands, Japan, and India. Thaicom Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPS-R.BK.long_name: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited
TPS-R.BK.summary: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited provides solutions for network computing and e-business. It engages in the distribution and installation of computer network systems, fully integrated communication systems, wireless communication systems, network security systems, and data center solutions and management systems. The company also offers consultancy services, such as LAN/WAN infrastructure, intranet/Internet, security system, IP telephony, network management system, design and best practice recommendation, network troubleshooting, and network equipment assessment. In addition, it provides network system management and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPS.BK.long_name: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited
TPS.BK.summary: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited provides solutions for network computing and e-business. It engages in the distribution and installation of computer network systems, fully integrated communication systems, wireless communication systems, network security systems, and data center solutions and management systems. The company also offers consultancy services, such as LAN/WAN infrastructure, intranet/Internet, security system, IP telephony, network management system, design and best practice recommendation, network troubleshooting, and network equipment assessment. In addition, it provides network system management and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSR-R.BK.summary: Thiensurat Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes water purifiers in Thailand. It also distributes air conditioners, water filters jugs, electric appliances, and other equipment, as well as offers personal and auto title loans. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TSR.BK.summary: Thiensurat Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes water purifiers in Thailand. It also distributes air conditioners, water filters jugs, electric appliances, and other equipment, as well as offers personal and auto title loans. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TUUF.F.summary: Solartron Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, sells, and installs solar-cell systems and related equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Selling and Installation of Solar-Cell Systems, Distribution SolarÂCell, Sale of Electricity, Hire of Work, and Other segments. It also constructs solar power plants; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. Solartron Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VCOM-R.BK.summary: Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in computers and equipment in Thailand. It operates through Sale of Goods and Rendering of Services segments. The company also provides software and related services for computers. In addition, it offers installation, consulting, and computer system maintenance services; and network security monitoring services. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

VCOM.BK.summary: Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in computers and equipment in Thailand. It operates through Sale of Goods and Rendering of Services segments. The company also provides software and related services for computers. In addition, it offers installation, consulting, and computer system maintenance services; and network security monitoring services. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

W-R.BK.summary: Wow Factor Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces, imports, exports, and sells electronics spare parts in Thailand, Germany, Hong Kong, China, and internationally. The company is also involved in the rental, sale, and proceeding of advertisements; and provision of printing services for various publications. In addition, it engages in restaurant, bar, coffee shop, and food and beverages operations; and sells food and beverages. The company was formerly known as Electronics Industry Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wow Factor Public Company Limited in May 2020. Wow Factor Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
